About Me

Hello! I'm Rigen Suringa, a junior software engineer. I graduated a vocational course in Information and communication technology. Currently I'm a third student from the Visayas State University (VSU) main campus,taking up Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.

What I do

My Services

Web Development

I specialize in front-end web development, creating fast and responsive websites using Nuxt, Tailwind CSS, HTML5, and JSP. I design intuitive user interfaces and ensure cross-device compatibility, delivering scalable and high-quality solutions tailored to each project's unique needs. My focus is on building efficient and visually appealing web experiences with modern technologies.

App Development

I specialize in application development, utilizing C# with the .NET framework to build robust, scalable solutions. My experience includes integrating APIs for secure authentication, ensuring that applications meet high standards of security and performance. I am dedicated to creating efficient, user-centric applications that deliver seamless functionality and a smooth user experience, tailored to meet the unique requirements of each project.

Documentation

I specialize in creating detailed project documentation, including use-case functionalities and capturing client requirements for their website. By thoroughly documenting each project's scope, features, and objectives, I ensure alignment with the client's vision. My focus is on providing clear, structured documentation that supports seamless development and helps deliver websites tailored to meet the client's unique needs.

Research

I conduct comprehensive research for each project, focusing on client needs, system requirements, and the latest technologies. This approach ensures that my solutions are well-informed, efficient, and aligned with industry standards. By thoroughly understanding project goals, I deliver websites that are not only functional but also tailored to meet the specific objectives and long-term vision of the client.
